posts.post_content:
Prices include shipping with insurance. Payment via Paypal Payment Owed to [url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url].

My e-mail is [url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url] if you would like an exact description of a card you are interested in. Offers are welcome, especially on multiple cards.

All of the scans are here:

[url]http://s1185.photobucket.com/albums/z356/npa589/11111/?start=all[/url]

 I have a spreadsheet with DIRECT links to front and back scans and prices if you'd like that.                                               E-mail me at:   [url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url]    if you want to be provided with that.
